      • checkDifferentName

        public boolean checkDifferentName(java.lang.String name)

        desc:

        Receive a string of characters, this method allows you to check if the entered parameter is equal to the attribute name of at least one of the angels in the arrangement of angels

        pre:

        An ArrayList of Angels must already be instantiated

        Parameters:
        *, - this parameter represents a character string
        Returns:
        this method returns a true value, which represents whether or not the entered parameter is equal to the name attribute of at least one of the angels in the arrangement of angels
